Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

I think I'll rejoin fully at this point too. I have my internet back and
have time to post again.  An active RPG seems like a good place for me to
restart posting.

As I recall, Rhinox was inside the Bushido Predecon's base, but that plot
has kind of fallen to the side.  Other characters at that base are Kratos,
some soul-eating predecon (I think), and Lady Spire (indefinitely in a
hidden stasis chamber).  So you can either start there, or bring him outside
and let him find trouble.

I think Waspinator, Silverbolt, Starscream and Cheetor are inactive (someone
may have tried to carry them along for a bit, but a lot of characters have
dropped off).  I don't remember Arcee.

As for my charcters, all of the Maximals except Depthcharge and Ravenchief
are in the Maximal base.  I have a couple Predecons that are off the radar
at the moment.

Welcome back

-Kraftlos (titobeau)
